THESE ABILITIES HAVE ENHANCED: Fixed `giveXP` command working like set XP instead of give XP.
NEW FEATURES!: A complete redesign/rewrite of the database.
You can now set any number of channels as voting channels. No limitations!
NEW COMMANDS!: Added `blacklist` command to blacklist users globally from using Bastion.
Added `ignoreChannels` command to ignore a server's text channel so that no commands can be used in that channel.
Added `ignoreRoles` command to ignore a server's roles so that no commands can be used by anyone in that role.
Added `votingChannels` command to set a channel as a voting channel. Any messages posted in the votingChannel are available for upvote/downvote.
